name: Future Crisis Cyber Theft Auto
description:
Discover the New Future Space City.

Save the World from Robot gang mafia crime and zombies lurking through the streets.

Survive fighting monsters with guns and sword.

Upgrade and unlock new abilities and technology.

Unlock jetpack power ability and fly through the sky to get a big view of city.

Fast travel through the city on Super speed bike unlocked for free.

The New Fantasy world of post apocalyptic world now filled with sci-fi gangsters and robot mafia will be rescued by you.

In this epic action game , you will save the future from monsters, robot gangs, mummy zombies with your awesome fighting skills and cool tech upgrades such as swords, laser gun and more.

Explore the city and reach danger areas whether by foot or by jetpack. Unlock space bike to rush through too.

Monsters,Robots , Zombies lurk the city roads. It's upto you to stop them and reclaim your future.

Features Include:

Awesome Action
Beautiful City
Multiple enemies
Cool jetpack
Awesome Upgrades
Haptic Feedback
Play offline without wifi
Fighting and flying action
Bike unlock fun ride
